title: Psalms 97:1
text: THE LORD reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof.

title: Psalms 97:2
text: Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne.

title: Psalms 97:3
text: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.

title: Psalms 97:4
text: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.

title: Psalms 97:5
text: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the LORD, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.

title: Psalms 97:6
text: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.

title: Psalms 97:7
text: Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.

title: Psalms 97:8
text: Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O LORD.

title: Psalms 97:9
text: For thou, LORD, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.

title: Psalms 97:10
text: Ye that love the LORD, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.

title: Psalms 97:11
text: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.

title: Psalms 97:12
text: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
